_comment_start: RESONANT · RETENTION METRICS EXPORT — v1.0 | Aggregated · Read-only · Pitch-safe

meta.description: Retention metrics derived from intentional listening sessions, grouped by listening duration buckets.

methodology.retentionDefinition: A session is considered retained if listening duration meets or exceeds 15 minutes.
methodology.bucketLogic: Sessions are grouped into duration ranges to illustrate listening depth distribution.
methodology.sessionQualification: Only intentional listening sessions are included.
methodology.aggregationLevel: Collective retention behavior only (no individual tracking).

notes: This file contains no executable logic.
Designed for sponsor decks, retention analysis, and BI ingestion.
Safe for public and partner sharing.
_comment_end: END OF FILE — RESONANT RETENTION METRICS · FREEZE LOCKED
